POST.POST_BODY:
No fruits
No juices

They all bring up my sugar

How about celery and peanut butter?
Any ideas? tips?

RESPONSE.RESPONSE_BODY:
Sugar free peanut butter and celery / carrot sticks.
Nuts.
Boiled or scrambled eggs
Cheese
Some cold meats (better unprocessed though, ie. cold roast chicken.
Plain yoghurt.

I'm always craving salt so i normally eat nuts at night. If I want something sweet I do carrot stick or celery with peanut butter and a few chocolate chips. Sometimes I'll have yogurt. There are so many options. If my post meal blood sugar is a little lower I may do popcorn or something with a few carbs. I try to have protein with my carbs to help slow digestion.
